Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago Avenue, Pulaski, Augusta, Homan & Chicago Avenue, due to police activity near Chicago/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago Avenue, Pulaski, Augusta, Homan, then resume their normal route on Chicago Ave, due to police activity near Chicago/Hamlin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
